entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Shamattawa
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
